item.title: Hiring Virtual Assistants for Social Media Account Creation and Video Posting - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled and motivated individual to build and manage a team of efficient and reliable virtual assistants (VAs). The main responsibilities will include creating and managing social media accounts and regularly posting engaging videos. The goal is to optimize video performance and reach a wide audience, generating a significant number of views. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of social media platforms, video editing and production skills, and knowledge of analytics tools to track and analyze video performance.

Skills required:
- Social media management
- Video editing
- Content creation
- Analytics
- Team management

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of around 3 to 6 months. We are seeking an expert-level individual who can lead the team to success.


Posted On: July 01, 2024 05:08 UTC
Category: Recruiting & Talent Sourcing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Facebook
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Facebook
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for long form videos on Youtube - Upwork
item.description:
Video editor for a Cars/ Automative and Vehicles things Youtube channel.

Video style will be a combination of the two videos
https://youtu.be/7CkIgY9B3WA?si=IYUjqMmO-oV2j9n2

Scripts and voice over will be provided
Looking for 1-2 videos per week

Proposal price is orientation; it can range from $20 to $40.

We are looking for someone with the following requirements:
1. Fast turn around time 24-48 hours
2. Fast response times
3. Good understanding of storytelling and Youtube retention.

Budget: $30

item.title: Hiring a professional video editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking to hire a video editor. After a trial period, this position could become long-term.

Your job will be to edit reels for social media from raw video footage.

We will provide you with raw footage of holistic teachers talking in an interview format, and your job is to edit it into engaging reels.

The successful applicant must speak fluent English and have past experience in editing reels. It would be very helpful if the editor has experience in holistic wellness, such as practicing yoga, tai chi, breathwork, etc.

When applying, please let us know why you think you are the right person for this role.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$7.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 04:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Video Editing
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Video Editing
Country: THA
click to apply

item.title: Looking for UGC Video Creators - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, I’m looking for talented video creators to make fun, lively 20-30 second vertical UGC videos for our brand. These videos will live on Facebook and Instagram Reels and help drive leads to our website, so high energy and a natural, friendly style is key.

We just need the footage, and we'll do all the editing.

Here are our requirements
Your video should:
-Be shot vertically at 9:16 aspect ratio
-Follow the script we provide
-Have excellent lighting and crisp, clear audio with no background noise
-Have your own original voice. It shouldn't be AI-generated
-Feel raw, authentic and unscripted - this shouldn't seem like an ad
-Be upbeat and animated - think telling a friend about something exciting
-Align with our brand personality (you should review our website and YouTube to get familiar)

If you are interested, send me examples of UGC-style videos you have created. Video creation skills are a must, but personality fit will also be very important as we want to convey the right vibe.

Budget: $100
Posted On: July 01, 2024 04:48 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, UGC, Acting, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Production, UGC, Acting, Video Commercial
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Thumbnail Designer - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

We are looking for a talented and creative YouTube Thumbnail Designer. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for design, an understanding of YouTube trends, and the ability to create eye-catching thumbnails that attract viewers.

Responsibilities:

- Create engaging and visually appealing thumbnails for YouTube videos.
- Ensure consistency with the channel's branding.
- Stay updated with current YouTube trends and apply them to thumbnail designs.
- Collaborate with the content team to understand video themes and requirements.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in graphic design, specifically for YouTube thumbnails.
- Proficiency in design software (e.g., Photoshop, Illustrator).
- Strong portfolio showcasing previous thumbnail designs.
- Ability to work quickly and meet deadlines.
- Excellent communication skills.

We have attached images of sample thumbnails as examples.

Looking forward to seeing your creative work!


Posted On: July 01, 2024 04:33 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery, YouTube, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery, YouTube, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing
Country: Estonia
click to apply

item.description:

item.title: Creating Original Anime Videos (10-15 mins) - Upwork
item.description:
My youtube channel focuses on original, short anime-style videos of 10 - 15 mins.

I will provide the script and audio. The hired person must refer to the script and use AI prompts to create video for each scene in the script. Each scene should be 3 - 7 seconds. The total duration of the scenes must match the audio duration.

Character appearance and their outfits (depending on the storyline) must be consistent. You may use AI tools such as Leonardo AI, MidJourney and/or Pika to create the video scenes. You must have access to these tools already.

After creating the video scenes, you will need to video edit them to create a smooth video, and add in the audio for the script and ensure the narration matches the scenes and script.

Each project must be completed within 1 week but I'm open to negotiation if more time is needed.

This is a new channel and I expect to post 1 anime video per week so it is a long term collaboration if you are able to meet the requirements of the project.

Please send in a sample of similar work that you have done e.g: scenes created by AI generative tools that shows consistent character and outfits in different scenes.

Budget: $15
Posted On: July 01, 2024 04:23 UTC
Category: AI Image Generation & Editing
Skills:AI Image Generation, Generative AI Prompt Engineering, Leonardo Ai, Midjourney AI, DALL-E, Video Editing
Skills: AI Image Generation, Generative AI Prompt Engineering, Leonardo Ai, Midjourney AI, DALL-E, Video Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Need freelancers From the USA to BUY our Product and make pictures/video of it - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking to hire around 100 Freelancers from the US.

We are looking for US-based freelancers interested in exchanging product videos and images for a free product + $10.

Responsibilities:
*Buy the product
*Send a short video/images with the product

Requirements:
*Based in the US!! (This is a must)
*Willingness to provide a short video/images
*Good communication skills

Meanwhile, great feedback for your profile will be left for fast, responsive work.
Also, this is a long-term project with many other products.

If you are interested in this job, please apply.
Thank you!

Budget: $10
Posted On: July 01, 2024 04:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Country: Bulgaria
